item.title: Getting started with kendo-grid
item.description: Installation or Setup # We can add Kendo-UI grid in HTML5/Javascript, ASP.NET MVC, JSP and PHP project/application. Please follow below steps to add kendo-UI grid in HTML5 page. # Create empty html5 page. Include kendo.common.min.css and kendo.default.min.css. Add a link tag within the head tag. Kendo-UI library is depended on Jquery. So, include kendo.all.min.js and kendo.aspnetmvc.min.js after jQuery. There are two possible ways to instantiate a Kendo UI grid. From an empty div element.
